title: Asmodeus
description: When aspiring witch Brianna Claxton accidentally summons a demon from the Abyss, not even her favorite "Oops" spell can save her from her attraction to the dangerously hot, unbelievably arrogant demon, Asmodeus. But when four Death Angels appear and demand Brianna send Asmodeus back to his life of eternal torture, the fires that flare between Brianna and Asmodeus take on a new significance. Will they have to deny their forbidden love to save each other, or will love be the catalyst that redeems them?
author: Dawn McClure
